description.en: EverGrow Coin is a deflationary token designed to become more scarce over time. All holders of EGC will earn an 8% reward from every Buy/Sell Transaction in USDT. 3% from Every Buy/Sell Transaction is sent to Buy-Back wallet while 2% is transferred into the liquidity pool for Pancakeswap to create a stable price floor. EverGrow Ecosystem consists of NFT Lending, Marketplace, Content Subscription Platform, Staking pools & Play-to-Earn Game.
